titleStmt.title: A warning peece shot off from Ireland to England, charged home with good counsell, by a truhearted Englishman, a mourner in Sion. Wherein these evill dayes, and dangerous times (without reflecting upon any particular persons) are plainly set forth.
titleStmt.author: Truhearted Englishman.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
